The car made dust go up. It went to the Big House.

They did not care about the car.
Their boss was coming. He did not visit for ten months.
Sam waited.
Mr. Carter was Sam's boss. He did not come here often.

Sam liked this.
Sam stayed away from his boss.
Then Sam could keep his job longer.
Mr. Carter wiped sweat from his neck.
His shirt was wet.
The wet parts looked like shapes on a map.
His skin was red. The sun in June made it red.
But his skin showed he stayed inside.
He got money. Other people did the work for him.
